div.head: 小便秘澀
div.div: minor relief blocked and rough; urine is blocked or rough

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: minor relief blocked and rough; urine is blocked or rough

sense.def: Illness Sign identical with xiao bian bu li 小便不利①, urine does not flow freely. Zheng lei ben cao 證類本草 Substance Entry da dou chi 大豆豉 quotes MTKH : 蝦蟇小者有毒 , 主人小便秘澀 , 臍下憋 , 疼痛至死者。以生豉一合 , 投新汲水半碗 , 浸令水濃 , 頓飲之 , 愈 , “Small toads with poison control [conditions] where a person’s urine is blocked and rough . It is stopped up below the navel, with excruciating pain. Take 1 ge offresh [ da dou ] zhi and allow it to macerate in a half bowl of water freshly drawn from a well until the water has become viscous. Then have [the patient] immediately drink this, and he will be cured”.
